title: The Fire Gem Quest
description: Deep inside the Lava Mountain lies a magical gem that grants one wish. Can three brave knights find it and bring back the King's lost crown?

preview.tagline: Can you find the legendary Fire Gem and restore the King's crown?

ageRating.reason: Lava and fire imagery may be intense for younger children

prologue.worldIntro: Welcome to the Kingdom of Brightshield! Long ago, the King's magical crown fell into Lava Mountain during a great earthquake. Without it, the King has been sad for years. Legend says a Fire Gem deep in the volcano can grant one wish!

characterIntros.introText: Brave Climber loves adventure and isn't afraid of anything! With trusty climbing rope and gear, no mountain is too tall and no ledge is too tricky!
Clever Scientist knows everything about volcanoes and gems! With goggles, a notebook, and a curious mind, every mystery can be solved!
Kind Whisperer has the biggest heart and can talk to any creature! Even fire spirits and lava lizards become instant friends!

prologue.missionBrief: The three knights must journey into Lava Mountain, find the legendary Fire Gem, and wish for the King's crown to return! It won't be easy — the volcano is full of bubbling lava, tricky caves, and a mysterious Fire Guardian who protects the gem.

characters.name: Brave Climber
characters.description: A fearless mountain climber with rope and climbing gear who tackles any terrain

characters.name: Clever Scientist
characters.description: A junior scientist with goggles and a notebook who studies volcanoes and gems

characters.name: Kind Whisperer
characters.description: A gentle creature whisperer who can talk to animals and fire spirits

scenes.narrationText: The knights arrive at the base of Lava Mountain. Steam hisses from cracks in the ground. Glowing embers drift through the air like fireflies. The path ahead leads into the smoking volcano!

successOutcome.text: Quick counting! 'One-two-three-GO!' Everyone dashes between steam bursts perfectly.

failOutcome.text: Oops, got a little steamy! But the warm mist feels like a spa. 'Ahhhh, refreshing!'

successOutcome.text: Sharp eyes spot a rocky ridge with no steam! 'This way, everyone!'

failOutcome.text: The path has tiny steam puffs, but they make cute whistling sounds! Musical volcano!

successOutcome.text: The golden shield glows! Embers bounce off like popcorn. Pop pop pop!

failOutcome.text: Some embers land on the shield and spell out 'HI!' How friendly!

successOutcome.text: Everyone huddles under the shield. Cozy AND safe! The embers patter like rain.

failOutcome.text: The tent is a bit cramped! But the giggly squishing makes everyone laugh.

characterTurns.promptText: A little lava lizard looks lost!

successOutcome.text: The lizard chirps happily and scurries home! Its family waves tiny claws in thanks.

failOutcome.text: Wrong direction! But the lizard's family comes looking and finds everyone. Group hug!

choices.label: Ask it to be our guide

successOutcome.text: The lizard squeaks excitedly and runs ahead, showing secret shortcuts! New friend!

failOutcome.text: The lizard is too shy but leaves a trail of glowing footprints to follow. Thanks, little buddy!

outcome.resultText: The knights make it through the ashen fields! Ahead, a river of glowing lava blocks the path.

scenes.narrationText: A wide river of bubbling orange lava stretches across the path! Dark rocks float slowly on the surface like stepping stones. On the other side, the cave entrance glows invitingly.

successOutcome.text: The golden shield bounces the heat back! A cool bubble of air surrounds everyone.

failOutcome.text: The shield gets warm like a cookie tray! But it makes everyone's snacks perfectly toasty.

successOutcome.text: Whoosh whoosh! The shield makes a perfect fan. Everyone sighs in relief.

failOutcome.text: The fanning blows everyone's hair into silly styles! Looking fabulous AND cooler!

successOutcome.text: Hop-hop-hop! Perfectly timed jumps across every rock. 'Come on, follow me!'

failOutcome.text: One rock spins! But it turns into a fun merry-go-round ride to the other side. Wheee!

successOutcome.text: The rocks move in a pattern! 'Left, right, middle, jump!' Everyone crosses safely.

failOutcome.text: The pattern changes! But a friendly lava turtle offers rides across. All aboard!

successOutcome.text: 'You can do it! We believe in you!' Big smiles and a perfect landing!

failOutcome.text: The cheering is SO loud it echoes and makes everyone laugh! Still jumped though!

successOutcome.text: Holding hands, jumping as one! 'One-two-THREE!' Perfect teamwork landing!

failOutcome.text: Everyone lands in a pile! But it's a happy pile on safe ground. Group tumble!

outcome.resultText: Across the lava river! A lava flower blooms and offers a magical petal.

scenes.narrationText: Inside the volcano! The Ember Caves glow with orange and red crystals. Paths twist in every direction. Somewhere deep inside, the Fire Gem is waiting!

successOutcome.text: The tiny glowing bugs happily swirl around like a living lantern! So pretty!

failOutcome.text: The fireflies are shy! But they leave a glowing trail on the walls to follow.

successOutcome.text: A loose crystal becomes the perfect torch! It even changes colors. Oooh!

failOutcome.text: The crystal is stuck! But rubbing it makes it glow brighter. DIY nightlight!

successOutcome.text: Zoom down three paths! 'The middle one has warm air — that's the way!'

failOutcome.text: Got a little lost! But found cave paintings showing the way. Ancient GPS!

successOutcome.text: A soft humming comes from the left path! 'The gem is singing to us!'

failOutcome.text: Hear a rumbling tummy! It's a friendly cave bat who points the right way for a snack.

successOutcome.text: The shield glows and creates a protective bubble! Rocks bounce right off.

failOutcome.text: The dome is lopsided! But the falling rocks stack into a helpful staircase. Bonus!

successOutcome.text: One mighty push! The rocks tumble aside and reveal a shortcut!

failOutcome.text: The push is too strong! But it opens a hole to a crystal-filled room. Jackpot!

outcome.resultText: Through the caves! A warm golden glow beckons from a grand chamber ahead.

scenes.narrationText: A magnificent Fire Guardian — a great phoenix made of living flame — perches on a high pedestal! Below her sits the legendary Fire Gem, glowing like a tiny sun. 'Who seeks my gem?' she asks kindly.

successOutcome.text: The Guardian's eyes soften. 'You seek the gem to help another? How noble!'

failOutcome.text: Words get jumbled! But the Guardian sees the kindness in those eyes. 'I understand.'

successOutcome.text: The deepest, most respectful bow. The Guardian bows back! 'Manners! I like you.'

failOutcome.text: Almost falls over! The Guardian chuckles warmly. 'Brave AND humble!'

successOutcome.text: The shield glows in response to the Guardian's flame! 'A true protector's heart!'

failOutcome.text: The shield reflects the Guardian's flame into pretty patterns! 'Ooh, a light show!'

successOutcome.text: 'I promise to always protect those in need!' The Guardian nods approvingly.

failOutcome.text: Voice cracks nervously! But the Guardian sees the true courage underneath.

successOutcome.text: Zoom! Around the chamber three times! The wisps applaud with sparkles.

failOutcome.text: The wisps are TOO fast! But they teach some cool moves. Now everyone's faster!

successOutcome.text: 'What runs but never walks?' 'A RIVER!' 'Correct!' The Guardian is impressed.

failOutcome.text: 'A... nose?' Wrong! But the Guardian laughs so hard she lets everyone pass anyway.

outcome.resultText: The Fire Guardian smiles! 'You have proven your hearts are true. The Fire Gem is yours!'

scenes.narrationText: The Fire Gem floats gently into your hands, warm and glowing! Together, all three knights hold the gem and close their eyes. 'We wish for the King's crown to return!' The gem bursts with golden light — POOF! The magical crown sparkles into existence, floating before you! You carry it out of the volcano to where the King waits hopefully. When he sees his crown, tears of joy stream down his face. 'My crown! You found it!'

outcome.resultText: The King places his magical crown back on his head and smiles the biggest smile the kingdom has ever seen! 'My kingdom has its crown, and I have the bravest knights!' Church bells ring across the land as everyone celebrates the heroes who ventured into Lava Mountain!

endings.title: Legendary Fire Knights!
endings.narrationText: The King declares a week-long festival in your honor! The Fire Guardian herself flies down from the volcano to join the celebration, filling the sky with beautiful flame fireworks. The King gives each knight a special medal made from Fire Gem crystal. From this day on, you are the official Fire Knights of Brightshield — heroes of flame and friendship!

endings.title: Brave Fire Seekers!
endings.narrationText: The King throws a grand feast! Everyone in the kingdom comes to celebrate the return of the crown. The Fire Guardian sends down warm sparkles from the volcano as a thank-you. You'll always be remembered as the brave knights who ventured into Lava Mountain!

endings.title: Crown Returners!
endings.narrationText: The King is SO happy to have his crown back! It was a tricky adventure with lots of stumbles and giggles, but you never gave up. The King promises you'll always have a place at the royal table. Heroes!
